text: I've recently been going down the cybernetics rabbit hole and am curious if anyone knows of any attempts at implementing Beer's Viable System Model in software? I feel like it might be a really powerful paradigm for an ai agent/automation framework... recursive systems built around feedback loops with LLMs in the mix for different responsibilities
